DIA_13655_Farmer_Pumpkin_03_01: Hey, newbie! Say, what's a pumpkin?
DIA_13655_Farmer_Pumpkin_03_03: Pumpkin is a big FRUIT! Isn't it?
DIA_13655_Farmer_Pumpkin_03_04: Oh no, no! It's a vegetable! The newbie will agree with me, won't he?
DIA_13655_Farmer_Pumpkin_Fruit_03_02: Well, someone finally admitted I was right. It's for you!
DIA_13655_Farmer_Pumpkin_Vegetable_03_02: And I was right! Hold it!
DIA_13655_Farmer_Pumpkin_Bullshit_15_01: I don't have time for such foolishness.
DIA_13655_Farmer_Pumpkin_Why_15_01: Why do you ask such silly things?
